::Lilly::
"You still can feel me can't you Koj?"

::Koj::
Laughing "Of course I'd never forget the woman I love?"

::Lilly::
"Koj I want you to leave this planet can't you just take a leave off of 
fighting?"

::Koj::
"Every since I was a kid all I lived for was fighting and the death of 
farther and to be the best."

::Lilly::
"If only I had lived we could have lived for each other."

::Koj::
"But you didn't your dead?" Koj stirs the fire.

::Lilly::
"This is our last meeting Koj I want you to forget about me you have to move 
on even if it is to be hurt again."

::Koj::
"I'll never forget."
